message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you our product. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $11,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to offer $11,000. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $11,250. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
